name: nko2016-sample
description: A barebones Node.js app using Express 4

scripts.build: echo please use one of: npm run build-dev  or  npm run build-prod
scripts.build-dev: browserify -d -o public/js/bundle.js -e public/js/client.js && uglifyjs public/js/bundle.js > public/js/bundle.min.js
scripts.build-prod: browserify -o public/js/bundle.js -e public/js/client.js && uglifyjs public/js/bundle.js > public/js/bundle.min.js

author: Scott Elcomb <psema4@gmail.com> (http://psema4.ca)
